name: smart4u
0:
”Alexa, turn on "smart outlet"”
”Alexa, turn off "smart outlet"”
”Alexa, turn on security system”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1.You need to prepare a samrt4u smart device ,such as a alarm system or an outlet. 
2.Connect the samrt4u smart device to WIFI or GPRS,please refer to the user manual provided for details.
3.Enable this Skill and link your Amazon account with the samrt4u smart device by entering the User Name and Password of the samrt4u smart device. 
4.After linked and granted successfully ,now you can give a command to the linked smart4u smart device through Echo./Tap/Dot.

Such as 
Alexa,turn on "smart outlet"
Alexa,turn off "smart outlet"
Alexa, turn on security system
Alexa, turn off security system
Alexa, turn on emergency

*"smart outlet" is the default name of the device,you could redefine the name by yourself.

Find out more at https://smart.smart4alarm.com/skilldocument.html
